customer_name: A R ALLIGATOR FARM & PETTING ZOO INC.
site_name: A R ALLIGATOR FARM & PETTING ZOO INC

citations.narrative:
** The male rabbits are housed as a group and show signs of aggression and fighting, the rabbits have missing fur with
healed superficial scratches. The facility stated that the rabbits have been fighting and are in the process of fixing the
situation. The aggressive animals must be removed from the group. All rabbits housed in the same enclosure must be
compatible to provide for the health and well-being of the animals. To be corrected by: 03-07-22.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
End Section
